description:
Stacked, like your favourite multi-tool. The Pagoda Tour 112 is built for dedicated backcountry skiers, and has the versatility to float, grip and climb. Carbon laminate is incredibly light and creates moderate damping with solid power and bite, and the wood and foam core gives you stability and float while keeping your turns playful.

  • Carbon sandwich construction is light, torsionally stiff, strong, and powerful
  • Improved dampness and smoothness makes the ski ask for more speed even when the conditions gets choppy
  • Layered ash, paulownia, aspen and foam core for power, energy, and dampness
  • Textured nylon top sheet is snowphobic
  • Third Rail Sidewall Technology uses bio-based microalgae formulated for its dampening characteristics, bend strength, and impact resistance
  • RP shaping provides an approachable, surf-inspired turning radius of 15 m
  • Wide profile Rockwell 48 steel edges provide excellent edge control without sacrificing a playful, floaty ride
  • World Cup Race base is fast and hard for exceptional performance
name: DPS Skis Pagoda 112RP Tour Skis - Unisex
